One free 4 months promotion per customer. Promo valid for users who receive this offer directly from Shippo or Brex. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first four months after signup.
terms.FREESTYLE1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo‚Äôs Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
terms.NOLABELFEES: Enjoy our professional plan, which includes no per-label fees and the ability to brand your customer emails and tracking pages for free. One free Shippo professional subscription for 5 years per customer. You need to switch your plan to Professional in Shippo after applying the code. Promo valid only for users that receive the offer directly from Shippo, purchase under 5 thousand labels per month, and use Shippo's master accounts with USPS and DHL. Offer must be redeemed by December 31, 2019. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid for 5 years after redemption. Shippo reserves the right to evaluate promotions on an annual basis to account for potential changes to its plans and pricing.
terms.SHIP2TEE: Buy and ship your first {{minUnits}} USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo‚Äôs Master Accounts before {endDate} and get a Shippo T-shirt. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One Shippo T-Shirt per customer, while supplies last. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
terms.SHIP150: Buy and ship your first USPS or DHL Express package using Shippo‚Äôs Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
terms.SHIPHERO1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo‚Äôs Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or ShipHero. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
